verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> "You <S%G4671><s%> may <S%G2010><s%> speak <S%G3004><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> yourself. <S%G4572><s%>" Then <S%G5119><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> stretched out <S%G1614><s%> his hand, <S%G5495><s%> and made his defense. <S%G626><s%>

"I think <S%G2233><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> happy, <S%G3107><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Agrippa, <S%G67><s%> that I am <S%G3195><s%> to make my defense <S%G626><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G4675><s%> this day <S%G4594><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> all the things <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I am accused <S%G1458><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%>

especially <S%G3122><s%> because you <S%G4571><s%> are <S%G5607><s%> expert <S%G1109><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> customs <S%G5037><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> questions <S%G1352><s%> which are <S%G2596><s%> among <S%G2453><s%> the Jews. <S%G1485><s%> Therefore <S%G1189><s%> I beg <S%G4675><s%> you <S%G3116><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> me patiently. <S%G3450><s%>

"Indeed, <S%G3303><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> know <S%G2467><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> way of life <S%G3767><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> my youth <S%G3503><s%> up, <S%G3588><s%> which was <S%G1096><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> my own <S%G3450><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> and at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem; <S%G2414><s%>

having known <S%G4267><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> from the first, <S%G509><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they are willing <S%G2309><s%> to testify, <S%G3140><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the strictest <S%G196><s%> sect <S%G139><s%> of our <S%G2251><s%> religion <S%G2356><s%> I lived <S%G2198><s%> a Pharisee. <S%G5330><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> I stand <S%G2476><s%> here to be judged <S%G2919><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of the promise <S%G1860><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> our fathers, <S%G3962><s%>

<S%G1519><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> twelve tribes, <S%G1722><s%> earnestly <S%G1616><s%> serving <S%G3000><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> hope <S%G1679><s%> to attain. <S%G2658><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> this <S%G3739><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> I am accused <S%G1458><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Agrippa! <S%G67><s%>
Why <S%G5101><s%> is it judged <S%G2919><s%> incredible <S%G571><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> does raise <S%G1453><s%> the dead? <S%G3498><s%>

"I <S%G1473><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> most certainly <S%G3767><s%> <S%G99999><s%> thought <S%G1380><s%> that I ought <S%G1163><s%> to do <S%G4238><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%> contrary <S%G1727><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth. <S%G3480><s%>

This <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G4160><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%> <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> both <S%G2623><s%> shut up <S%G2623><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> in prisons, <S%G5438><s%> having received <S%G2983><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the chief priests, <S%G749><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> when they <S%G846><s%> were put to death <S%G337><s%> I gave <S%G2702><s%> my vote <S%G5586><s%> against them. <S%G2702><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Punishing <S%G5097><s%> them <S%G846><s%> often <S%G4178><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> I tried to make <S%G315><s%> them blaspheme. <S%G987><s%> <S%G5037><s%> Being <S%G1693><s%> exceedingly <S%G4057><s%> enraged <S%G1693><s%> against them, <S%G846><s%> I persecuted <S%G1377><s%> them even <S%G2193><s%> <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> foreign <S%G1854><s%> cities. <S%G4172><s%>

"Whereupon <S%G3739><s%> as <S%G2532><s%> I traveled <S%G4198><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Damascus <S%G1154><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the authority <S%G1849><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> commission <S%G2011><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the chief priests, <S%G749><s%>

at <S%G2250><s%> noon, <S%G3319><s%> O king, <S%G935><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> on <S%G2596><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> a light <S%G5457><s%> from the <S%G5228><s%> sky, <S%G3771><s%> brighter <S%G2987><s%> than the sun, <S%G2246><s%> shining around <S%G4034><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who traveled <S%G4198><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> me. <S%G1698><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2257><s%> had all <S%G3956><s%> fallen <S%G2667><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> saying <S%G2980><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> in the Hebrew <S%G1446><s%> language, <S%G1258><s%> <S%G4549><s%>" 'Saul, Saul,4549 why5101 are you persecuting1377 me?3165 It is hard4642 for you4671 to kick2979 against4314 the goads.2759'"

But <S%G235><s%> arise, <S%G450><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> feet, <S%G4228><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I have appeared <S%G3700><s%> to you <S%G4671><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> this purpose: <S%G5124><s%> to appoint <S%G4400><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> a servant <S%G5257><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a witness <S%G3144><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> of the things which <S%G3739><s%> you have seen, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> of the things which <S%G3739><s%> I will reveal <S%G3700><s%> to you; <S%G4671><s%>

delivering <S%G1807><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the people, <S%G2992><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3568><s%> I send <S%G649><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%>

to open <S%G455><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes, <S%G3788><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> they may turn <S%G1994><s%> from <S%G575><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from the power <S%G1849><s%> of Satan <S%G4567><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> that they <S%G846><s%> may receive <S%G2983><s%> remission <S%G859><s%> of sins <S%G266><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> an inheritance <S%G2819><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> are sanctified <S%G37><s%> by faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> me. <S%G1691><s%>'"
"Therefore, <S%G3606><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Agrippa, <S%G67><s%> I was <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> disobedient <S%G545><s%> to the heavenly <S%G3770><s%> vision, <S%G3701><s%>

but <S%G235><s%> declared <S%G518><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> to them <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> Damascus, <S%G1154><s%> <S%G2532><s%> at Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the country <S%G5561><s%> of Judea, <S%G2449><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> also to the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> that they should repent <S%G3340><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> turn <S%G1994><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> doing <S%G4238><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of repentance. <S%G3341><s%>
For <S%G1752><s%> this reason <S%G5130><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> seized <S%G4815><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and tried <S%G3987><s%> to kill me. <S%G1315><s%>

Having <S%G5177><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> obtained <S%G5177><s%> the help <S%G1947><s%> that is from <S%G3844><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> I stand <S%G2476><s%> to <S%G891><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> testifying <S%G3140><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> to small <S%G3398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great, <S%G3173><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> <S%G1622><s%> but <S%G5037><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> said <S%G2980><s%> would <S%G3195><s%> happen, <S%G1096><s%>

how <S%G1487><s%> the Christ <S%G5547><s%> must <S%G3195><s%> suffer, <S%G3805><s%> and how, <S%G1487><s%> by the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> he would be first <S%G4413><s%> to proclaim <S%G2605><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> both to these people <S%G2992><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>"

As <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> thus <S%G5023><s%> made his defense, <S%G626><s%> Festus <S%G5347><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> "Paul, <S%G3972><s%> you are crazy! <S%G3105><s%> Your great <S%G4183><s%> learning <S%G1121><s%> is driving <S%G4062><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> <S%G1519><s%> insane! <S%G3130><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> he said, <S%G5346><s%> "I am <S%G3105><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> crazy, <S%G3105><s%> most excellent <S%G2903><s%> Festus, <S%G5347><s%> but <S%G235><s%> boldly declare <S%G669><s%> words <S%G4487><s%> of truth <S%G225><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> reasonableness. <S%G4997><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> knows <S%G1987><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> these things, <S%G5130><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> freely. <S%G3955><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G5100><s%> am persuaded <S%G3982><s%> that none <S%G3756><s%> <S%G99999><s%> of these things <S%G5130><s%> is hidden from <S%G2990><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> this has not <S%G3756><s%> been <S%G2076><s%> done <S%G4238><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a corner. <S%G1137><s%>
King <S%G935><s%> Agrippa, <S%G67><s%> do you <S%G4100><s%> believe the prophets? <S%G4396><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you believe. <S%G4100><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Paul, <S%G1722><s%> "With a little persuasion <S%G3982><s%> are <S%G1096><s%> you trying to make <S%G1096><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> a Christian? <S%G5546><s%>"

Paul <S%G3972><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> "I <S%G302><s%> pray <S%G2172><s%> <S%G99999><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2172><s%> whether with little or with much, <S%G3756><s%> not only <S%G3440><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that hear <S%G191><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> this day, <S%G4594><s%> <S%G2532><s%> might <S%G1722><s%> become <S%G4183><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> as <S%G3697><s%> I <S%G1722><s%> am, <S%G1510><s%> except <S%G3924><s%> for these <S%G5130><s%> bonds. <S%G1199><s%>"

The <S%G2532><s%> king <S%G935><s%> rose up <S%G450><s%> with <S%G2532><s%> the governor, <S%G2232><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Bernice, <S%G959><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who sat <S%G4775><s%> with them. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G2532><s%> they had withdrawn, <S%G402><s%> they spoke <S%G2980><s%> one <S%G4314><s%> to another, <S%G240><s%> saying, <S%G3754><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> does <S%G4238><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of bonds. <S%G1199><s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to Festus, <S%G5347><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> might have been <S%G1410><s%> set free <S%G630><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he had <S%G1941><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> appealed <S%G1941><s%> to Caesar. <S%G2541><s%>"
